text: The man dressed in linen, who was above the river's waters, lifted both hands to heaven and made a solemn promise by the One who lives eternally. I heard him say, “It will last for a time, times, and half a time. When the scattering12:7. “Scattering”: or, “shattering.” of the power of the holy people has come to an end, then all these things will also come to an end.”
